about_the_game: The god of the afterlife thought the eternal, endless void of the afterlife was pretty boring so god made a sick obstacle course for deceased souls and offers a special prize to souls that reach the top. But god thought it would be too short with how long eternity is, so they even made the controls in the afterlife hard to use! Try your skill in this precision platformer where you can dash in any direction to gain new heights and distances as you climb your way to the top to meet god and receive god's special prize.
detailed_description: The god of the afterlife thought the eternal, endless void of the afterlife was pretty boring so god made a sick obstacle course for deceased souls and offers a special prize to souls that reach the top. But god thought it would be too short with how long eternity is, so they even made the controls in the afterlife hard to use! Try your skill in this precision platformer where you can dash in any direction to gain new heights and distances as you climb your way to the top to meet god and receive god's special prize.
name: don't not live Demo
short_description: don't not live is a precision platformer where you can dash in any direction. Climb to the top of the afterlife to meet god and receive the special prize for completing his hellish obstacle course.
